My Projects

Days of coding can save you hours of planning.

Serpents Edge

Personally Developed

This app was with built with Javascript and React, and has been styled with SASS. Bcrypt was used to provide password security, and Stripe was used to complete the purchase. Nodemailer was also employed to send customers a confirmation email. The data is stored in a PostgreSQL database, and Node has been used to connect the client to the server.

If you would like to interact with the app yourself, please click on the project button below.

Project GitHub

Checked

Group Developed

The project was collaboratively built by a team of Dev Mountain students as their final project. The front end was built JavaScript and React and connected to a PostgreSQL database via a server built with Node, Massive, and Express. Checked is fully styled with SASS. User information has been secured with Bcrypt. Other technologies include chess.js as well as chessboardjsx.

If you would like to interact with the app yourself, please click on the project button below.

Project GitHub
